Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.TUI.TUIViews

Class TUIConnectionView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.View
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.TUI.TUIViews.TUIView
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.TUI.TUIViews.TUIConnectionView
public class TUIConnectionView extends TUIView
Singleton class representing the connection setup view in the Terminal User Interface (TUI). It extends the TUIView class and implements methods for handling connection setup and retry prompts.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.TUI.TUIViews.TUIView

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    connectedConfirmation()
    Displays a confirmation message upon successful connection to the server.

    Displays the connection setup screen, allowing the user to input server IP address, communication technology, and nickname for connecting to the server.

    Returns the single instance of TUIConnectionView, creating it if necessary.
    boolean
    retryConnectionPrompt(boolean causedByNetworkError)
    Displays a prompt asking the user if they want to retry the connection due to a network error or nickname conflict.

    • retryConnectionPrompt

      public boolean retryConnectionPrompt(boolean causedByNetworkError)
      Displays a prompt asking the user if they want to retry the connection due to a network error or nickname conflict.
      Overrides:
      retryConnectionPrompt in class TUIView
      Parameters:
      causedByNetworkError - True if the retry prompt is due to a network error, false if due to nickname conflict.
      Returns:
      True if the user chooses to retry, false otherwise.
